description: Database schema for storing and managing AI outputs, prompts, and related metadata in N8N workflows

core-tables.description: Primary data storage (prompts, outputs, conversations, binary files)

tables.name: binary_file_data
tables.description: Storage for binary files attached to outputs (images, audio, etc.)

tables.name: conversations
tables.description: Conversation threads containing multiple prompts and outputs

tables.name: outputs
tables.description: AI-generated outputs with metadata and relationships

tables.name: prompts
tables.description: User prompts submitted to AI assistants

system-tables.description: AI infrastructure management (assistants, agents, workflows, users, sessions)

tables.name: ai_agents
tables.description: AI agents that orchestrate multiple assistants and workflows

tables.name: ai_assistants
tables.description: AI assistant configurations with model and parameter settings

tables.name: credentials
tables.description: API credentials for external AI services

tables.name: n8n_workflows
tables.description: N8N workflow definitions for automation

tables.name: sessions
tables.description: User sessions tracking conversation contexts

tables.name: system_prompts
tables.description: System-level prompts and templates

tables.name: users
tables.description: User accounts and profiles

tracking-tables.description: Lifecycle management and analytics (quality, revisions, usage, feedback loops)

tables.name: agent_performance_metrics
tables.description: Performance metrics for AI agents

tables.name: improvement_feedback_loop
tables.description: Feedback loop for continuous improvement of agents and assistants

tables.name: output_collections
tables.description: Curated collections of related outputs

tables.name: output_knowledge_extraction
tables.description: Extracted knowledge entities from outputs

tables.name: output_lifecycle
tables.description: Lifecycle state transitions for outputs

tables.name: output_revisions
tables.description: Version history and revisions of outputs

tables.name: output_semantic_relationships
tables.description: Semantic relationships between outputs

tables.name: output_tracking
tables.description: Tracking metadata for outputs (views, exports, shares)

tables.name: output_usage_analytics
tables.description: Usage analytics and access patterns for outputs

tables.name: output_value_assessment
tables.description: Value assessments and ratings for outputs

tables.name: prompt_tracking
tables.description: Tracking metadata for prompts

tables.name: quality_assessments
tables.description: Quality assessments and validation of outputs

security-tables.description: Compliance and privacy (PII detection, information sensitivity, sharing policies)

tables.name: information_sensitivity
tables.description: Sensitivity classification levels

tables.name: information_sharing_policy
tables.description: Policies for sharing information based on sensitivity

tables.name: pii_detection
tables.description: PII detection results for prompts and outputs

lookup-tables.description: Reference data (LLM models, STT models, API parameters, retention policies)

tables.name: api_parameters
tables.description: API parameter configurations for different models

tables.name: api_usage
tables.description: API usage tracking and cost metrics

tables.name: data_retention_policies
tables.description: Data retention policies based on sensitivity levels

tables.name: llm_models
tables.description: LLM model catalog with capabilities and costs

tables.name: mcp_usage
tables.description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) usage tracking

tables.name: qa_validation_taxonomy
tables.description: Quality validation criteria taxonomy

tables.name: retention_policies
tables.description: Retention policy definitions

tables.name: speech_to_text_models
tables.description: Speech-to-text model catalog

tables.name: ui_interfaces
tables.description: UI interface definitions for different interaction modes
